article_title: WHO says Gaza hospital raided by IDF not functional
sentence: One  source  inside  the  hospital,  who  did  not  want  to  be  named,  told  BBC  News  that  11  patients  had  died  due  to  interruptions  in  the  supply  of  electricity  and  oxygen,  and  that  several  doctors  had  been  arrested.

article_title: WHO says Gaza hospital raided by IDF not functional
sentence: The  Israeli  military  says  it  has  killed  about  20  Hamas  fighters  and  seized  numerous  weapons  in  the  area  of  the  hospital.

article_title: WHO says Gaza hospital raided by IDF not functional
sentence: At  least  1,200  people  were  killed  during  attacks  in  Israel  by  Hamas-led  gunmen  on  7  October  last  year.

article_title: WHO says Gaza hospital raided by IDF not functional
sentence: More  than  28,400  Palestinians,  mostly  women  and  children,  have  been  killed  and  more  than  68,000  wounded  since  the  war  began,  according  to  the  Hamas-run  health  ministry.

article_title: WHO says Gaza hospital raided by IDF not functional
sentence: It  added  that  at  least  127  Palestinians  have  been  killed  and  205  others  injured  in  the  past  24  hours.
